paper_abstract: In this paper we present a new method, time-striding hidden Markov model (TSHMM), to learn from long-term motion for atomic behaviors and the statistical dependencies among them. TSHMM is a 2-layer hidden Markov model, which approximates a variable-length hidden Markov model by first-order statistical dependencies. An EM algorithm is proposed to learn the TSHMM.
paper_title: Automatic 3D motion synthesis with time-striding hidden Markov model
